name: A. Kevin and Arithmetic
input: InputEach test contains multiple test cases. The first line contains the number of test cases $$$t$$$ ($$$1 \le t \le 500$$$). The description of the test cases follows. The first line of each test case contains a single integer $$$n$$$ ($$$1\leq n \leq 100$$$) — the number of integers.The second line contains $$$n$$$ integers $$$a_1, a_2, \ldots, a_n$$$ ($$$1\leq a_i \leq 10^9$$$).
output: OutputFor each test case, output one integer — the maximum number of points.
